title: Necklace, "Melos", ca. 1873
provenance: Museum purchase through gift of Anonymous Donor, Annie Schermerhorn Kane, and various donors. Formerly in the collection of J. Pierpont Morgan.
dimensions: H x diam. (clasped): 16.6 x 0.6 cm (6 9/16 x 1/4 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Susan Dwight Bliss, Annie Schermerhorn Kane, and various donors
description: Gold mesh chain from which hang round enameled rosettes and vase-shaped pendants, in Greek-Etruscan style.

exhibitions.title: Ted Muehling Selects: Lobmeyr Glass from the Permanent Collection
Nancy and Edwin Marks Collection Gallery: Treasures from the Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Necklace, "Melos", ca. 1873.
ca. 1873. Gold, enamel. Museum purchase through gift of Susan Dwight Bliss, Annie Schermerhorn Kane, and various donors. 1969-40-17.
